helpText: بيت_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________لاحقة.

deleteInUseCategory.title: بيت_Delete category________________لاحقة
deleteInUseCategory.message: بيت_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________لاحقة.

custom.title: بيت_Custom categories__________________لاحقة
custom.message: بيت_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________لاحقة.

arcgis.title: بيت_ArcGIS categories__________________لاحقة
arcgis.message: بيت_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________لاحقة.

iso.title: بيت_ISO categories_______________لاحقة
iso.message: بيت_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________لاحقة.

inspire.title: بيت_INSPIRE categories___________________لاحقة
inspire.message: بيت_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________لاحقة.
